name: HUMAN TOUCH FOUNDATION
briefDescription: Human Touch is a registered youth-led non-profit organization based in Goa.  Human Touch informs, inspires and engages youth in development so that they get involved and take action to improve their local communities and change the world. Human Touch is currently working on four main initiatives in Goa, viz. 1)	HIV Prevention and Control2)	HIV Impact Mitigation and 3)	Promotion of Sexual and Reproductive Health and4)	 Drug Abuse Awareness and Prevention, We are passionate about sustainable development, the realization of the sustainable development goals (SDGs) and promotion of a culture of peace and universal human rights for all.
